When turning a view that has been detached from the workbench into a fast view,
I got the following exception:

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.runtime 4 2 Apr 13, 2004 11:06:00.597
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Animating rectangle".
!STACK 0
org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2659)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2584)
	at org.eclipse.swt.SWT.error(SWT.java:2555)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.error(Widget.java:354)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.getDisplay(Widget.java:442)
	at org.eclipse.ui.internal.RectangleAnimation.run(RectangleAnimation.java:147)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:62)

What are the odds. I just finished fixing this when I noticed this PR in my
inbox. :-) Fixed in head.
